title: Pulsefire Caitlyn Banner?
body: Is it suppose to be pixilated on the home website? I feel like maybe it could have been cleaner or just using the wallpaper would make it more attractive. Maybe it's just me LOL

replies.body:
Hi DreamerP! I think you are referring to this website: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pulsefire-caitlyn

I checked the website to identify where you may be seeing the distortion. The animated splash banner is running smoothly--I do see that the static splash art (that is downloadable) is a bit pixelated. This is because we had to compress the image on the website, however, if you click the splash art, a much clearer image will display for download :) 

Hopefully this helps answer your question!
